traits.Charge: If the rothxc3xa9 moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

actions.Gore: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
